name: Juggle Struggle
summary:
Juggle Struggle is a fast paced arcade jumper where you have to juggle the ball in the air under extreme conditions, as you try to avoid all incoming obstacles to become the Juggle Champion!
Compete against the world and your friends in 15 unique challenging stages.
The game features 36 different balls, ranging from basic sports balls (football, baseball, tennis ball, basketball etc), to more crazy balls like the sun, a disco ball, a slime ball, an atom or even a skull!
All balls have their own physic properties and you have to find the right ball, which fits your style of gameplay to beat the stages.
So, what are you waiting for? Enter the arena and become the juggle champion!
